projects.name: Automatic Image generator
projects.description: The project was built using full stack technologies, including frontend, backend, and database. The project generates images automatically within a specified time interval.

projects.name: Real-Time Restaurant Website
projects.description: Created dynamic website features using JavaScript, such as real-time menu updates and online ordering systems. Enhanced user engagement by 25% by implementing interactive UI elements and real-time updates using JS and HTML5 APIs.

projects.name: Simon game
projects.description: The project implements the classic Simon Game, where players must repeat a sequence of colors. The game's UI is built using HTML elements, including buttons for each color and a display area for the sequence.

experiences.description: Developed custom applications on the Salesforce platform using Apex and Visualforce. Optimized Salesforce performance by 30% through efficient coding and query optimization. Understand the main tasks that a Salesforce developer is responsible for, including customizing the Salesforce Platform using lowcode tools and developing user stories.

Collaborated with design team to create responsive web interfaces for hosting management platforms. Work with backend developers to integrate frontend code with backend APIs. Troubleshoot and debug frontend issues using browser developer tools.
